inbox.name: Elon Musk
inbox.subject: Need you to make a vision system in 12 months
inbox.message:
hi bob, 
 I need you to put your building skills to use and make a vision system for me in 12 months. 
 I'll pay you 12 million dollars if you finish it in one month - every month after that I will reduce 1 million 

 Elon

inbox.name: Albert Einstein
inbox.subject: I found it!
inbox.message:
hi bob, 

 I think I have finally finished my paper and I want you to take a read 


 Thanks and regards 
 Albert Einstein

inbox.name: Bill Gates
inbox.subject: Half of microsoft
inbox.message:
hi bob, 

 I want to give you half of microsoft 


 Thanks and regards 
 Bill Gates

inbox.name: nicola tesla
inbox.subject: Can you give me a PCB?
inbox.message:
hi bob, 

 I need a PBC to make a tesla coil 


 Thanks and regards 
 Nicola Tesla

sent.name: Bill Gates
sent.subject: Accepting half of microsoft
sent.message:
hi bill, 

 I will take half of microsoft 


 Thanks and regards 
 Bill Gates

sent.name: nicola tesla
sent.subject: Can you give me a PCB?
sent.message:
hi Nicola Tesla, 

 I will give you a PCB 


 you are welcome 
 bob
